definitions.definition: The quality of being reliable , dependable , or trustworthy .

the ability to measure the same thing consistently (of a measurement indicating the degree to which the measure is consistent); that is, repeated measurements would give the same result (See also validity ).
measurable time of work before failure

main_definition: The quality of being reliable , dependable , or trustworthy .
secondary_definitions: ( education ) the ability to measure the same thing consistently (of a measurement indicating the degree to which the measure is consistent); that is, repeated measurements would give the same result (See also validity ).
( engineering ) measurable time of work before failure
